commit.message: add the client startup time to the debug window / rename Version label to Client, which is better suiting now / add IBeamCursor for selectable text on the information page / make ">" sign on RPC page untranslatable / re-order XML-file tags to match real GUI element order

files.patch:
@@ -27,6 +27,19 @@
